name: Zesty Sandwich
description: The spicy sauce serves as a nice contrast to the sweetness of the vegetables in this sandwich.

name: Jam Sandwich
description: A sandwich made with only jam and slices of strawberry. The simplicity of this dish is what makes it so appetizing.

name: Tropical Sandwich
description: The balance of acidity and umami is key. A touch of extra marmalade is the trick to making it special.

name: Marmalade Sandwich
description: A simple, economical, and tasty sandwich. Toasting it for extra flavor is also good.

name: Avocado Sandwich
description: The flavor of this sandwich changes depending on the ripeness of the avocado. One never tires of eating this.

name: Paella de Paldea
description: The various ingredients form a harmony of flavors. This dish truly deserves to bear the name of the region.

name: Fruit Punch
description: A variety of fruits weave a deep, rich flavor not found in any other juice.

name: Escalivada
description: The roasted vegetables have a pronounced umami flavor. They are great as a side dish—or even as hors d'oeuvres.

name: Potato Tortilla
description: Its unpretentious taste is soothing to the heart and palate. One can't go wrong with this classic Paldean tapa.

name: Klawf al Ajillo
description: A dish for enjoying rare ingredients in a simple way. The leftover oil is good on pasta, too.

name: Seafood Pinchos
description: The seafood is so fresh you can almost hear the ocean. It is served up in a beautiful arrangement as well.

name: Arroz con Leche
description: The simple, gentle sweetness of this dish is comforting. It's good served chilled or warm.

name: Ceviche
description: The acidity of this dish serves to whet one's appetite. Its exceedingly fresh ingredients also add to the flavor.

name: Smoked Fillet with Herbs
description: This dish blends the scents of both smoke and herbs. It's almost as if you are eating the aroma itself.

name: Seafood Pasta
description: The toppings change with the market's catch of the day. In a sense, the sea decides what this pasta will taste like.

name: Four-Piece Sushi (Flower Set)
description: Four pieces of nigiri sushi inspired by beautiful flowers. They're all quite spicy for some reason.

name: Four-Piece Sushi (Bird Set)
description: Four pieces of nigiri sushi inspired by playful birds. They're all quite sweet for some reason.

name: Four-Piece Sushi (Wind Set)
description: Four pieces of nigiri sushi inspired by the blowing wind. They're all quite tart for some reason.

name: Four-Piece Sushi (Moon Set)
description: Four pieces of nigiri sushi inspired by the radiant moon. They're all quite bitter for some reason.

name: Miso Soup
description: This bowl of soup uses well-aged miso. Even the stock is something special.

name: Exclusive Four-Piece Sushi (Frost Set)
description: Four pieces of nigiri sushi inspired by crisp frost. This store-exclusive set was carefully selected by the chef.

name: Exclusive Four-Piece Sushi (Graupel Set)
description: Four pieces of nigiri sushi inspired by soft graupel. This store-exclusive set was made with all the skills of the chef.

name: Exclusive Four-Piece Sushi (Hail Set)
description: Four pieces of nigiri sushi inspired by stinging hail. This store-exclusive set is highly recommended by the chef.

name: Exclusive Four-Piece Sushi (Sleet Set)
description: Four pieces of nigiri sushi inspired by thick sleet. This store-exclusive set was made with all the chef's might.

name: Consommé
description: The clear broth is chock-full of umami. This store- exclusive dish is a work of passion.

name: Mapo Tofu
description: Though affordable, this dish is the real deal. The spicy, tingly taste is as authentic as can be.

name: Annin Tofu
description: The elegant, refreshing sweetness is gentle on the tongue. This dessert is a staple at many tables.

name: Pickled Toedscool and Cucumber
description: This dish is perfect as a palate cleanser. The unobtrusive acidity is very comforting.

name: Pepper Steak
description: The heavy seasoning of this dish makes it perfect as a side dish or a snack. It is a very popular menu item.

name: Ramen
description: The owner says he recreated this soy sauce-based ramen from a dish he had while traveling the Kanto region.

name: Galette de la Maman
description: This galette is made from the finest ingredients, refining the dish to its highest possible quality.

name: Compote du Fils
description: This compote is the height of decadence—a dish truly refined to outstanding quality.

name: Ratatouille du Grand-père
description: A ratatouille made from carefully-selected ingredients, refining the dish beyond measure.

name: Quiche de la Grand-mère
description: This quiche is made from first-rate ingredients—a dish that is refined to reach the pinnacle of quiches.

name: Pot-au-Feu de la Fille
description: Cost was not considered when making this pot-au-feu, refining it into the ultimate dish.

name: Dry Curry
description: This dish is notable for its poignant spiciness. Its reasonable price is also part of the appeal.

name: Chocolate-Vanilla Fruit Parfait
description: This has enough calories to keep a person going for a day. It is cost-effective for one's stomach.

name: Lemon Gelato
description: The acidity is stimulating despite its artificial nature. This dessert is perfect after an oily meal.

name: Caesar Salad
description: The mix of greens, veggies, and salad dressing in this dish makes it quite popular.

name: Salisbury Steak with Fried Fixings
description: One can't go wrong with this signature dish. The generous portions make it popular among youths.

name: Spicy Potatoes
description: The Scovillain sauce goes perfectly with the crispy fried potatoes.

name: Alfajores
description: The light, crunchy texture is very enjoyable. These treats go well with slightly bitter coffee.

name: Lemon Soda
description: It has freshly squeezed lemon juice and strong carbonation. It's a drink one wants to gulp down.

name: Coffee
description: A blend of coffee that's slightly on the bitter end. Its fragrant aroma makes it easy to keep drinking.

name: Quesadilla
description: A simple dish with only cheese and ham as fillings. It has a crispy texture and is easy to eat.

name: Five-Alarm Sandwich
description: A veggie-heavy stuffing and a piquant sauce make this sandwich a very refreshing meal.

name: Peanut Butter Sandwich
description: The thick sweetness lingers in the mouth—a treat for the taste buds.

name: Potato Salad Sandwich
description: The potato salad makes this sandwich nicely filling. This is a perfect lunchtime meal.

name: Pickle Sandwich
description: Pickles are the only filling in this single-minded sandwich. It's an exceedingly simple meal.

name: Egg Sandwich
description: The key is that the eggs aren't scrambled—rather, they are thinly-sliced boiled eggs.

name: Mustard Rice Ball
description: The subtle spiciness makes the rice taste sweet. The key to this dish is a light touch—it should not be dense or heavy!

name: Sweet Adzuki Bean Soup
description: This dish is good for a snack or as a dessert to wrap up a meal. Its gentle sweetness doesn't overstay its welcome.

name: Homemade Umeboshi
description: This pickled plum dish is so sour it'll numb your tongue. It has a nice kick of saltiness and a hint of umami.

name: Bitter Melon Stir-Fry
description: This is a recreation of a dish that the head chef encountered during her travels in the Hoenn region.

name: Soba Noodle Soup
description: This dish comes with a simple garnish of green onions, so one can enjoy the noodles and broth without distraction.

name: Dandan Noodles
description: The spicy flavoring is irresistible. This dish not only has a bite, but plenty of umami as well.

name: Tofu Pudding
description: This dish is good freshly made and piping hot, but it's also delicious served cold and drenched in syrup.

name: Hot and Sour Soup
description: This soup's thickness keeps it warm longer. The sourness of the seasonings is delicious.

name: Oolong Tea
description: With its refreshing bitterness and full-bodied aroma, this tea goes well with oily dishes.

name: House Special Hot Pot
description: This soup has an exceedingly rich flavor. It is said that the ingredients are a house secret.

name: Churro
description: Standard churro. Nothing fancy, but it's tasty all the same.

name: Chocolate Churro
description: A churro covered in chocolate. Nothing fancy, but it's tasty all the same.

name: Cinnamon Churro
description: This churro is covered in cinnamon. Nothing fancy, but it's tasty all the same.

name: Pinchitos
description: This dish is at its absolute best when freshly made. Its rich aroma whets the appetite.

name: Grilled Rice Balls
description: These rice balls have been grilled to perfection. The soy sauce-based marinade is very fragrant.

name: Strawberry Chocolate Crepe
description: Made using the Kantonian shop owner's prized recipe, this crepe is topped with strawberries and chocolate.

name: Strawberry Whipped Cream Crepe
description: Made using the Kantonian shop owner's prized recipe, this crepe is topped with strawberries and whipped cream.

name: Chocolate Banana Crepe
description: Made using the Kantonian shop owner's prized recipe, this crepe is topped with bananas and chocolate.

name: Mint Chocolate Ice Cream
description: The mint flavor is strong and the chocolate is bitter—a distinct contrast that keeps you coming back for more.

name: Fizzy-Pop Ice Cream
description: The texture of this icy treat is delightful—and its light sweetness is, too. You'll never get tired of eating this.

name: Strawberry Ice Cream
description: Fresh strawberries are folded into the ice cream, so you can taste their natural sweetness.

name: Mango Ice Cream
description: Well-ripened mangoes are carefully selected for this ice cream. Its stunning sweetness may not be for everyone.

name: Nacli Salt Ice Cream
description: This is the shop's signature ice cream, using Nacli's salt for its gentler flavor.

name: Teriyaki Ice Cream
description: This dish is secretly very popular, with the sweet-and-salty sauce bringing many repeat customers.
